import React from 'react' import '../styles/Info.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faTruckFast, faDolly, faFaceSmileBeam, faDollarSign } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const Info = () => { return (

We provide the best customer experience

We ensure our customers have the best shopping experience

Shop with Confidence

Experience peace of mind with our 100% money-back guarantee on defective or disliked products.
) } export default Info
